3D Printer.name: 3D Printer
3D Printer.description: Using the new Star Talent (on the 2nd tab of Star Talents), you can collect samples to start printing resources!

Talent Book Library.name: Talent Book Library
Talent Book Library.description: Relive your youth by checking out books, and further relive your youth by never returning them! Instead, use them to boost your talent max levels.

Death Note.name: Death Note
Death Note.description: Defeat TONS of monsters to boost your Multikill Rate for each world. Upgrading this tower also boosts your base Multikill Bonus in all worlds.

Salt Lick.name: Salt Lick
Salt Lick.description: Spend refinery salts and other World 3 Resources in return for bonuses from the hungry blobulytes!

Chest Space.name: Chest Space
Chest Space.description: Just gives more Storage Chest slots, straight up. I gotchu dawg, yeh. (Passive Upgrade)
Chest Space.bonus: +2 Storage Chest Slots @ +{ more Storage Chest Slots

Cost Cruncher.name: Cost Cruncher
Cost Cruncher.description: Reduces the resource costs of upgrading buildings. Doesn't affect 'building' phase cost (Passive Upgrade)

Trapper Drone.name: Trapper Drone
Trapper Drone.description: Remotely deploy AND collect traps to and from any discovered critter location! Collect-all is based on Hunter's Eagle Eye Talent.

Automation Arm.name: Automation Arm
Automation Arm.description: Automate some of the more tedious actions with the flip of a switch! Let the robots do the dirty work!
Automation Arm.bonus: +{ Automated System, controlled via @ the Robotic Arm.

Pulse Mage.name: Pulse Mage
Pulse Mage.description: Zaps a single nearby monster. @ Has fast speed, and low damage.
Pulse Mage.bonus: +{% Damage @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Fireball Lobber.name: Fireball Lobber
Fireball Lobber.description: Lobs exploding fireballs. @ Has medium speed, and medium damage.
Fireball Lobber.bonus: +{% Damage @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Boulder Roller.name: Boulder Roller
Boulder Roller.description: Rolls a boulder forward. @ Has slow speed, and medium damage, but reliably hits multiple enemies.
Boulder Roller.bonus: +{% Damage @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Frozone Malone.name: Frozone Malone
Frozone Malone.description: Casts a wave of freezing snow. @ Has slow speed, but can stack it's effect with other Freeze Towers.
Frozone Malone.bonus: +{% Range @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Stormcaller.name: Stormcaller
Stormcaller.description: Smites enemies with lightning @ Has super slow speed, but high damage.
Stormcaller.bonus: +{% Damage @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Party Starter.name: Party Starter
Party Starter.description: Confetti! @ Has no function other than its Trait Boosts.
Party Starter.bonus: +{% Range @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Kraken Cosplayer.name: Kraken Cosplayer
Kraken Cosplayer.description: Summons eyeball defenders. @ Has slow speed, and just keeps monsters away.
Kraken Cosplayer.bonus: +{% Spawn Rate @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Poisonic Elder.name: Poisonic Elder
Poisonic Elder.description: Poisons enemies. @ Has slow speed, but great AoE for hitting large crowds of mobs.
Poisonic Elder.bonus: +{% Damage @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Voidinator.name: Voidinator
Voidinator.description: Teleports monsters back to the start, and sets them all to a certain amount of HP.
Voidinator.bonus: +{% Recharge Speed @ +}% Lower Upgrade Costs in Worship

Woodular Shrine.name: Woodular Shrine
Woodular Shrine.description: This shrine increases the Total Damage of all characters on the same map. Level it up by claiming AFK Gains on the same map.

Isaccian Shrine.name: Isaccian Shrine
Isaccian Shrine.description: This shrine increases the Max HP and Total Defence of characters on the same map. Level it up by claiming AFK Gains on the same map.

Crystal Shrine.name: Crystal Shrine
Crystal Shrine.description: This shrine increases Shrine Level Up Rate for all other shrines on the same map. Level it up by claiming AFK Gains on the same map.

Pantheon Shrine.name: Pantheon Shrine
Pantheon Shrine.description: This shrine increases the Carry Capacity of all characters on the same map. Level it up by claiming AFK Gains on the same map.

Clover Shrine.name: Clover Shrine
Clover Shrine.description: This shrine increases the Drop Rate of all characters on the same map. Level it up by claiming AFK Gains on the same map.

Summereading Shrine.name: Summereading Shrine
Summereading Shrine.description: This shrine increases all EXP gain for all characters on the same map. Level it up by claiming AFK Gains on the same map.

Crescent Shrine.name: Crescent Shrine
Crescent Shrine.description: This shrine increases Crystal and Giant Spawn chance, and Active EXP gain, of all characters on the same map. U know how to lvl it up lol.

Undead Shrine.name: Undead Shrine
Undead Shrine.description: This shrine increases the Respawn rate of all monsters on the same map.

Primordial Shrine.name: Primordial Shrine
Primordial Shrine.description: This shrine increases the AFK Gain Rate of all characters on the same map, but only if you have less than 80%.
